Text: Prime getting even better for members… :) https://t.co/ePn5zJEERx
Another important step toward our mission of running Amazon’s global operations on 100% renewable energy by 2025 – 5 years ahead of our initial goal. https://t.co/rJX0Fd8RKv
Still plenty more to do, but proud of our incredible teammates who make this a special place to work… https://t.co/DDTH4fVQQA

Excited for Project Kuiper to partner w/ @Arianespace, @ulalaunch & @blueorigin to deploy 3K+ broadband satellites in the coming years. Scale of this agreement will help us bring fast, affordable broadband to customers in unserved & underserved communities.https://t.co/ApkkFTCLm5
(2/2) Our latest partnership ($124M) will build 1K+ homes next to public transit. https://t.co/PXLsGritxj

As we continue to increase our focus on the communities in which we have a substantial presence, we’re excited to invest further in affordable housing. To date, we've committed more than $1.2B to create/preserve 8,000+ homes and help ~18K people. (1/2)

Important milestone for the #ClimatePledge - 300+ companies have now joined Amazon in committing to reach net-zero carbon emissions by 2040. Innovation and collaboration are key to solving big global challenges…encouraging to have these companies on board.https://t.co/IcvDZsvVIZ

Appreciative of our incredible women leaders and builders. Our teams are stronger and products are better when they include diverse perspectives and experiences. We’re committed to supporting women and their careers here at Amazon. #InternationalWomensDay #IWD2022

Good luck to Garfield HS Girls Basketball team in WA State Finals tonight. What a year they’ve had! Same for Boys team, which finished 4th in State tournament + lost only 1 game all year. Impressive to watch hard work/commitment all year by these athletes. https://t.co/bcxrLV5nf1 https://t.co/3UjzJWxgPT

(2/2) We’re supporting humanitarian relief NGOs on the ground with cash donations from Amazon and our employees, logistics to get supplies to people needing them, and cyber security assistance to companies and governments.
The situation in Ukraine is deeply concerning, and gets more so each day. Amazon stands with the people of Ukraine, and will continue to help. (1/2)

Proud of the fact that Amazon has been voted one of the most admired companies in the world for the sixth year straight (#2). We have a lot to keep working on, and committed to getting better every day, but feel lucky to work with the folks that I do. https://t.co/KqfGAGgCI7

Very excited to share this with customers…we're opening Amazon Style, our first-ever physical store for apparel. It will be located in L.A. and use machine learning and a unique store design to create a customized experience for each shopper. https://t.co/rKsQAVPYqW
A lot of people are excited for the upcoming @LOTRonPrime series (including me!). Today, we officially share its name...Can’t wait for the premiere September 2! https://t.co/SDfpQD53Bt
Some pre- #reInvent #storage goodies today… #AWS https://t.co/LmQ3AtPJQD

Excited to give customers Amazon EC2 P4d instances, the next generation of GPU-powered instances w/ 3x faster performance, up to 60% lower cost, & 2.5x more GPU memory for #machinelearning training & #HPC workloads vs previous generation instances #AWS https://t.co/nPfDc7IwFk

Happy to announce our upcoming #AWS region in Switzerland...will help Swiss #developers, institutions, innovative #startups, & world-leading pharma companies deliver #cloud-powered applications & fuel economic development across the country https://t.co/DPCdTPGuMW
This is what we mean when we say game changer...graph is pretty compelling. Love seeing customers getting cost savings like this w/ #AWS Graviton2-based instances https://t.co/pqWbDkuTSB

Expanding our Graviton2-based instances w/ the launch of new Amazon EC2 T4g burstable instances. With 4 instance types offering our game-changing Graviton2 chips, customers are enjoying 40% better price performance for a wide range of workloads https://t.co/XeWhTNd0To
@Gr8fulJ @Giants @NFL @NextGenStats True, JD...

As a huge football fan (Go @Giants!) I know the 2020 season may feel a bit different – but we’re proud to continue partnering w/ the @NFL to bring @NextGenStats to life & enhance the experience for fans, players, coaches, broadcasters & more #AWS https://t.co/KWKGJm7agl

Excited to support @weta_digital – the #visualeffects company known for The Lord of the Rings & Avatar – as they go all-in on #AWS to accelerate innovation & content production, while enabling artists globally to create and render visual effects https://t.co/MyV3f121dx

Thrilled to support @telefonica_de & their cloud native #5G core network deployments — #AWS delivers full automation & elasticity w/ the ability to dynamically scale & allocate 5G network capacity to meet the needs of their biz customers https://t.co/TIJq0mdEFK

Companies lose tens of billions to fraud every yr. Excited to give customers Amazon Fraud Detector so they can more easily identify identity & payment fraud w/ the same #machinelearning & expertise developed over 25 yrs running https://t.co/Zxxvz1iy7W #AWS https://t.co/1k99UOmcGJ

Excited to see customers embrace the new frontier of data with #AWS. Customer @capellaspace is going all-in, launching the world’s largest commercial Synthetic Aperture Radar (SAR) satellite system to collect data during all-weather conditions, day & night https://t.co/G6VhL4uBVV

GA of Amazon CodeGuru, a #developer tool powered by #machinelearning where #AWS customers get intelligent recommendations for improving code quality & identifying an app’s most expensive lines of code https://t.co/ORt8AnsuQj
Excited to see the big, diversified data company — @IHSMarkit — moving from on-premises datacenters to the #Cloud and #AWS https://t.co/YXnRCv0nY8

Proud to launch the #AWS Europe (Milan) Region and deepen our ongoing support/commitment to Italian customers —  secure, scalable, highly available computing power is critical to helping Italian communities stay connected during this difficult time https://t.co/hFKdiYyPDB

Inspired by the innovation of #AWS customers & partners – like @Nextdoor, @UCSDHealth, and so many more – who are delivering to support those on the front lines of #COVID19 & helping the rest of us remain safe & productive while staying home https://t.co/HlSlrDVJv2

What's esp cool is a 19-year-old Providence resident came up with the idea in order to make it easy to donate phones/tablets/laptops to #RhodeIsland hospitals – @GovRaimondo listened/acted on idea, & facilitated collaboration w/ the #medical community. Love the team innovation. https://t.co/AifnxCOgAS
